results.title: Responses of Human Endothelial Cells to Pathogenic and Non-Pathogenic Leptospira Species
results.text_hl: In addition, supplementing antibiotic therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or derivatives with endothelial protective activities may decrease the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Leptospirosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007922 @@@leptospirosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Martinez-Lopez DG, Fahey M, Coburn J. Responses of Human Endothelial Cells to Pathogenic and Non-Pathogenic Leptospira Species PLoS Negl Trop Dis. 2010 Dec 14;4(12):e918. PMID: 21179504
